Theerkadarishi (UA)

Movie

  • Release Date: 05 May 2023
  • OTT Release Date: 09 Jun 2023
  • Genre(s): Thriller, Crime
  • Language(s): தமிழ்
  • Director(s): P.G. Mohan, PG Mohan, L.R. Sundarapandi, M.R. Pandiyarrajan
  • Cast(s): Ajmal Ameer, Sathyaraj , Sriman , Poornima Bhagyaraj, Devadarshini See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 2h 1min
  • Music: G. V. Prakash Kumar,Guna Balasubramanian,C Sethu,Yogi Sekar,T. Udayakumar
  • Similar To: Pichaikkaran 2, Vikram Vedha
  • Story:

    A stranger keeps calling the police control room to hint about various crimes and accidents that are about to occur in the near future. Can the police department stop an accident based on his information and also find out who their mysterious informer actually is?

    Full Story
7.2/10
